item.title: Quick Company Research Tips üîç ‚Ä¢ Scan the company's website for recent news. ‚Ä¢ Check LinkedIn for employee insights. ‚Ä¢ Review Glassdoor for company culture info. ‚Ä¢ Search for recent press releases or articles. ‚Ä¢ Note the company's mission and values. What unique insight can you share in your interview about the company? #interview #preparation #ScalePilot #SocialPilot #AIAutomations
